name: Ghost Of The Town (luv.ivy)
description:
A ghost, goes around town and explores. The player can interact with the npcs and influence their stories, but it has to be in secret. If the npcs find out about the existence of a ghost, you lose.

WARNING:

The game is still in development, therefore it is likely to suffer changes as time goes by. For now, this is a beta version made for testing and only the first level is unlocked.
